author: Unreal Engine
description:
We threw down the gauntlet to all comers to settle it on the dance floor and create a 10-second dance animation with Unreal Engine 5.6—and boy, did you bring the moves.

Check out the winning performances of the 2025 Unreal Engine Dance Animation Challenge in our body-popping, rug-cutting, move-busting sizzle reel. 

Want to learn how to create animation like this in Unreal Engine? Check out our animation guides and tutorials: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/unreal-engine/animating-characters-and-objects-in-unreal-engine

---
#UnrealEngineDanceAnimationChallenge, #UE5, #Animation
title: Unreal Engine Dance Animation Challenge 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
Tim Miller reveals how he went from running Blur Studio to directing one of the most iconic superhero debuts of all time. The real story behind landing Deadpool

Full talk: https://youtu.be/LAEMO0VE2-o

#UE #TimMiller #LoveDeathandRobots #Deadpool #SecretLevel #Animation
title: How Tim Miller got to Direct Deadpool

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, J.T. Rooney of Silent Partners Studio (SPS) provides a tour of a number of projects to showcase how flexible UE can be as part of larger team workflows, including Justin Timberlake’s Forget Tomorrow World Tour; La Haine, the French musical based on the 1995 film of the same name; Katy Perry’s augmented reality broadcast during the AFL Opening Ceremony; the 2024 Country Music Awards; and a number of other events in 2024.

Over the course of the last ten years, Silent Partners Studio has grown and evolved with the live entertainment industry, including pixel spaces and screen sizes growing exponentially, complexity of shows increasing, and the ever-changing needs of performers and artists around the world. 

SPS’s founders grew the company from backgrounds in VJing, photography, traditional art, and motion graphics backgrounds, and from the very beginning, working in music especially requires a certain level of understanding of real-
title: Silent Partners' Real-Time Solutions for Live Shows & the Live Experience | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, we explore the workflow for creating unique characters using MetaHuman tools, with a focus on following a distinct artistic vision. 

You'll get an overview of key features in MetaHuman Creator, then delve into the character creation process from a conceptual standpoint—covering creative choices, practical techniques, and common challenges. 

Designed for artists and developers, this talk highlights how to fully leverage the Epic ecosystem for high-quality, personalized digital humans.

Find out more about MetaHuman here: www.metahuman.com

#MetaHuman, #DigitalHumans, #MetaHumanCreator, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Creating Bespoke Characters with MetaHuman Creator | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
